structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Approval of unification plan by commission.
law.text: Following its final public hearing, the unification review commission shall vote on the proposed unification plan as presented or as modified by the commission. A unification plan approved by a majority vote of the commission members shall be submitted to the registered voters in the county for a vote at the next regular election.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006.
